section.name: Jetspeed Build and Quality Testing
section.p: SpikeSource runs nightly builds of Jetspeed-2 on a set of Linux platforms (Suse, Fedora, Redhat...). The builds run an entire Jetspeed-2 build and all unit tests. Additionally, code coverage tests are run. The results of these tests are available at the SpikeSource website.
